" Ah [Piccadilly]7-piccadilly ! hallowed recollections may attach to those stones worn by the feet of [the busy idiots in [this vast asylum]2911-this vast asylum]2910-the busy idiots in this vast asylum , for [one sane man]2912-one sane man has trodden them , and [I]1692-the almighty listened to the words of wisdom as they dropped from the lips of one so obscure that [his]2912-one sane man name is still unknown in [the land]2059-the land , but [I]1692-the almighty doubted not who at that moment was [the greatest man in [Piccadilly]7-piccadilly]2914-the greatest man in piccadilly .[1692-the almighty]

[Piccadilly]7-piccadilly , July 15 . It will be seen by the date at which [I]0-i am writing this , that [I]0-i have been compelled to increase the pace [I]0-i have been keeping up during the season . The fact is , [my]0-i episode , like those of [[my]0-i neighbours]1607-my neighbours , seems likely to be prematurely concluded by the course of political events , which will no doubt act prejudicially this year upon the happiness of [many interesting members of society]1694-many interesting members of society . Towards the close of the [London]5-london season it is only natural that everything should culminate ; but generally [the actors in the scenes of real life]1695-the actors in the scenes of real life so calculate that the curtain falls just at the right moment ; or rather , that [they]1695-the actors in the scenes of real life shall be doing just the right thing when the curtain falls . [The artists]1696-the artists insensibly group [themselves]1696-the artists for the grand tableau . All over the stage episodes are occurring , any one of which taken separately would make a good sensation finale . There are [wily mothers]1697-wily mothers and desperate daughters throwing with unerring aim [their]1695-the actors in the scenes of real life nets over youths who have become reckless or imbecile . And there are [unprincipled poachers]1698-unprincipled poachers setting snares for the pretty game [they]1698-unprincipled poachers hope to destroy . Look at [the poor victims]1699-the poor victims , both male and female , trying to get disentangled . What a rush , and shuffle , and conflict of feelings and affections it is ! The hearts that for the first time feel [they]1700-they have been touched as the moment of separation draws near ; the " histories "[1701-his] which in all future time will form the most marked page in [his]1701-his or [her]1702-her life , and which have begun and ended in the season ; the intimacies that have been formed , and which are to last for ever ; those that have been broken ; the fatal friendships which have been cemented this year , and the disastrous results of which , suspected on neither side , [we]1703-we shall read of in the newspapers years to come . What a curious picture would be the mind of [London]5-london society if [we]1703-we could photograph it in February , and how strangely different would it be from a photograph of the same subject taken in July , more especially when , as now , the elections throw everything into confusion ; and [little Haultort]232-lord haultort gets so bewildered , that [he]232-lord haultort encloses , by mistake , [his]232-lord haultort address to [[his]232-lord haultort constituents]1704-his constituents to [Wild Harrie]219-wild harrie , instead of [his]232-lord haultort proposal to [her]219-wild harrie , which [he]232-lord haultort has forwarded to [[his]232-lord haultort local attorney]1705-his local attorney for publication in [the Liberal organ of [that borough]1707-that borough]1706-the liberal organ of that borough which is honoured by possessing [him]232-lord haultort as [a representative]1708-a representative ! In these days when good taste requires that [our]1703-we affections should be as shallow as [our]1703-we convictions , [we]1703-we are puzzled , at a crisis like this , to know which [we]1703-we love most , [our]1703-we seats or [[our]1703-we mistresses]1709-our mistresses . There is a general disposition on the part of [the lavender - gloved tribe]1039-the lavender - gloved tribe to resent the extra wear and tear of mind suddenly imposed upon [them]1039-the lavender - gloved tribe this hot weather . Why should [they]1039-the lavender - gloved tribe unexpectedly be called away from the corners devoted to tête - à - têtes , to stand on [hotel balconies]1711-hotel balconies , and stammer , in unintelligible language , [their]1039-the lavender - gloved tribe views upon Reform to [crowds of free and independent electors]1712-crowds of free and independent electors ? " [Squabbleton]254-squabbleton is close to [the coast]2916-the coast , and [we]2917-we will make a party , and [I]190-larkington will take [you]115-lady veriphast all round in [[my]190-larkington yacht]2918-my yacht , [the Lovetons]255-the lovetons and [you]115-lady veriphast and [Veriphast]115-lady veriphast ; [we]2917-we 'll go and do the electioneering business together , and keep [the yacht]2919-the yacht as a sort of pied — terre , or rather pied à mer ; "[190-larkington] and [Larkington]190-larkington chuckled , partly at [his]190-larkington joke , and partly at this brilliant solution of [his]190-larkington dilemma . And so , while all [the world]271-the world is trying to reconcile [their]271-the world pleasure with what [they]271-the world are pleased to term [their]271-the world duty , being always the duty [they]271-the world owe to [themselves]271-the world , [my]0-i thoughts are diverted into a very different channel . [I]0-i am beginning daily to feel , while in [the world]271-the world , that [I]0-i am less of it . Already [I]0-i have cut [myself]0-i off from the one great source of interest which [Parliament]15-parliament afforded [me]0-i , and [I]0-i have not succeeded in [my]0-i love as a compensation — that is why [Larkington]190-larkington 's arrangement to secure both seemed a sort of mockery of [my]0-i misery . For it was impossible to resist the occasional fits of depression which reduced [my]0-i mind to the condition of white paper , and [the world]271-the world to that of a doll stuffed with sawdust . [I]0-i was suffering in this manner the day following the evening entertainment at [Lady Broadhem]166-lady broadhem 's , which [I]0-i have already described . The interview which impended inspired [me]0-i with vague terrors . The night before [I]0-i had looked forward to it with positive enjoyment . There is no greater bore than to get up morally and physically unhinged , upon the very day that [you]1718-you expect an unusual strain upon [your]1718-you faculties . The days it does not matter , [you]1718-you feel up to anything ; but nature too often perversely deserts [you]1718-you at the most critical moment . Now , upon the morning in question it was necessary as a preliminary measure for [me]0-i to go into [the City]1952-the city and acquire some information essential to the success of [my]0-i interview with [Lady Broadhem]166-lady broadhem , but before starting [I]0-i was anxious to gain a few particulars from [Grandon]110-grandon , the knowledge of which would materially aid [me]0-i in disentangling the complicated skein of [our]1720-our joint affairs . [I]0-i therefore looked in upon [him]110-grandon for a moment en passant . " [You]0-i have certainly at last most effectually contradicted the report [you]0-i were the means of originating , but the reparation was tardy , and should never have been rendered necessary . Do [you]0-i know that [she]166-lady broadhem contemplated taking a very serious step ? "[0-i] [I]0-i did not know how to approach the subject , and felt embarrassed now that [I]0-i found [myself]0-i obliged to explain to [a daughter]764-a daughter that [[her]764-a daughter mother]365-her mother was going to marry [the man that [daughter]531-daughter had rejected]1753-the man that daughter had rejected , as an act of revenge . " No , "[124-lady ursula] said [Lady Ursula]124-lady ursula . " [I]124-lady ursula have suspected by [her]166-lady broadhem preoccupied manner for many days past that [mamma]1938-mamma had decided upon something , but [I]124-lady ursula have shrunk from speaking to [her]166-lady broadhem of [her]166-lady broadhem own plans . " So [I]0-i have , "[0-i] [I]0-i replied , " but [I]0-i am bound to secrecy for another twenty - four hours ; meantime , listen ! [I]0-i am going to retire from [Dunderhead]35-dunderhead . "[0-i] " [You]2443-old fellow going to retire ! "[110-grandon] said [Grandon]110-grandon , astounded . " Why , [you]2443-old fellow never told [me]110-grandon of this . When did [you]2443-old fellow make up [your]2443-old fellow mind ? "[110-grandon] " [It]3034-it made itself up , as it always does , "[0-i] [I]0-i said , laughing . " It never puts [me]0-i in the painful position of having to decide , but takes its own line at once . [I]0-i am going to [America]17-america by the next steamer . "[0-i] Now , when [I]0-i tell [[my]0-i readers]308-my readers that when [I]0-i began to talk to [Grandon]110-grandon [I]0-i had no intention whatever of going to [America]17-america , [they]308-my readers will be able to form some idea , if [they]308-my readers have not done so already , of what a funny mind [mine]0-i is . It came upon [me]0-i with the irresistible force of an inspiration , and from that moment [I]0-i was morally booked and bound at all hazards to go . [Grandon]110-grandon knew [me]0-i so well that [he]110-grandon was less surprised than [he]110-grandon might have been , and only sighed deeply . [He]110-grandon felt at that moment that there was something hopelessly wrong about [me]0-i . [He]110-grandon had been so often encouraged by a certain steadiness which [I]0-i maintained for some time , and which led [him]110-grandon to think [me]0-i changed , and so often disappointed ; for when [he]110-grandon least expected it [I]0-i broke the slender fetters of common - sense and conventionalism , which [he]110-grandon and society between [them]1781-them had woven round [me]0-i , and went off at a tangent . " Never mind , [old fellow]2443-old fellow , "[0-i] [I]0-i said , laughing , " there is no use sighing over [me]0-i . [I]0-i have pleasures and satisfactions arising from within that [I]0-i should not have if [I]0-i was like [everybody else]319-everybody else . Now , for instance:"—and[0-i] the eagerness and turmoil which [my]0-i new project excited within [me]0-i seemed to reduce every other consideration to insignificance , for [I]0-i began to feel conscious that , somehow or other , though [I]0-i had often been in [America]17-america before , this time it was to be to [me]0-i a newer world than ever . " Are [you]0-i going alone ? "[110-grandon] said [Grandon]110-grandon ; for [I]0-i had not finished [my]0-i sentence . " No , "[0-i] [I]0-i said ; and [I]0-i guessed who [[my]0-i companion]878-my companion was to be , though no words had been exchanged between [us]1783-us . " Who is going with [you]0-i ? "[110-grandon] [he]110-grandon asked , wonderingly , for [my]0-i manner struck [him]110-grandon , and [I]0-i scarcely heard [his]110-grandon question , so wrapt at that instance seemed all [my]0-i faculties . [I]0-i think [I]0-i fell asleep and dreamt , but [I]0-i ca n't recall exactly what [I]0-i seemed to see . [Grandon]110-grandon was shaking [me]0-i , [I]0-i thought , in the most heartless manner , and [I]0-i told [him]110-grandon as much when [I]0-i opened [my]0-i eyes . The fact was , [I]0-i was a little knocked up with excitement ; but [I]0-i would not go and lie down till [he]110-grandon promised [me]0-i to stand for [Dunderhead]35-dunderhead . Then [I]0-i went to bed , and did not get up till the lamps were being lighted in [Piccadilly]7-piccadilly . The result of such irregular hours was that [I]0-i was in bed next morning when [Spiffy Goldtip]159-spiffy knocked at [[my]0-i bedroom]347-my bedroom - door . [He]159-spiffy had worked very hard in [Lady Broadhem]166-lady broadhem 's interest , and explained to [me]0-i the scheme which [he]159-spiffy had arranged with [Bodwinkle]168-bodwinkle , by means of which , at a very considerable sacrifice of [[my]0-i own capital]1785-my own capital , [I]0-i could start [Lady Broadhem]166-lady broadhem and [[her]166-lady broadhem son]325-her son afresh in [the world]271-the world , on a very limited income , but devoid of encumbrances of a threatening or embarrassing nature . [I]0-i would far rather have invested the same amount in securing a larger income to [Grandon]110-grandon and [Ursula]124-lady ursula , if [they]1788-them were ever destined to be united ; but [I]0-i knew that , in the first place , nothing would induce [them]1788-them to take it from [me]0-i ; and in the second , that [I]0-i could only even now hope to extort [Lady Broadhem]166-lady broadhem 's consent to the match by the prospect [I]0-i was enabled to hold out to [her]166-lady broadhem of a period of financial repose . After all , [my]0-i own wants were moderate , and — 15,000 a - year satisfied [them]1788-them as well as — 20,000 . " [We]3037-we accomplished great things yesterday , "[159-spiffy] said [Spiffy]159-spiffy , rubbing [his]159-spiffy hands gleefully , for [he]159-spiffy had [himself]159-spiffy benefited by the settlement above alluded to . " When [I]159-spiffy showed [Bodwinkle]168-bodwinkle that [we]3037-we could make [the Scilly]257-scilly boroughs a certainty , [he]159-spiffy behaved like [a gentleman]495-a gentleman , and [[our]3037-we friend]2070-our friend [Chundango]140-chundango is to go out to [Bombay]12-bombay by the next mail , under more favourable conditions than [he]159-spiffy could have possibly expected . Of course [I]159-spiffy shall retire from contesting [Shuffleborough]97-shuffleborough to the more congenial atmosphere of [Homburg]109-homburg . Heigho ! "[159-spiffy] sighed [Spiffy]159-spiffy , " [I]159-spiffy have gone through a good deal of wear and tear this season , and want to recruit . "[159-spiffy] [I]0-i got rid of [Spiffy]159-spiffy as soon as [I]0-i had heard what [he]159-spiffy had to say , and [I]0-i was so satisfied with [his]159-spiffy intelligence that [I]0-i determined at once to see [Grandon]110-grandon , and to take [him]110-grandon with [me]0-i to [[Lady Broadhem]166-lady broadhem 's]1789-lady broadhem 's . "[0-i] " Did [Lady Broadhem]166-lady broadhem tell [you]110-grandon to ask [me]110-grandon ? " [[My]0-i dear old fellow]2097-my dear old fellow , the moment is come for [you]110-grandon to prove [your]110-grandon friendship by trusting [me]0-i thoroughly . "[0-i] " [I]1792-me have nothing to forgive ; but it would be an utter want of taste in [me]1792-me to go there unless [she]166-lady broadhem expects [me]1792-me , and wishes to see [me]1792-me , and [I]1792-me can hardly hope that , "[1792-me] [he]1792-me said , with a forced smile . For a moment [I]0-i doubted whether [I]0-i dared to risk it , but [I]0-i had placed [Lady Broadhem]166-lady broadhem in a position upon which [I]0-i could venture a good deal , and [I]0-i longed for the triumph and gratification of enjoying the success of [my]0-i own handiwork . It would be a triumph full of alloy , but [I]0-i wanted to see how much [I]0-i could achieve and — bear ; so [my]0-i hesitation vanished . " [I]0-i will take the responsibility on [myself]0-i , "[0-i] [I]0-i said ; " and believe [me]0-i , [I]0-i would not urge it if [I]0-i was not perfectly certain that [I]0-i was doing what is right . Remember how many times [I]0-i have blindly followed [your]249-drippings advice . [I]0-i only ask [you]249-drippings this once to follow [mine]0-i , and secure [your]249-drippings own happiness . "[0-i] The temptation was too strong , and [Grandon]110-grandon yielded ; but it was with a reluctant , doubtful step that [he]110-grandon approached the door [he]110-grandon had not this year ventured to enter . [It]1793-it was opened by [Drippings]249-drippings , and [I]0-i took the opportunity of having a little private conversation with [him]249-drippings in [the hall]642-the hall , in the course of which it was arranged that [he]249-drippings should exchange [[her]1795-her ladyship]2136-her ladyship 's service for [mine]0-i , and accompany [me]0-i to [America]17-america : the truth is , [I]0-i proposed settling [him]249-drippings [there]1987-there , and making [him]249-drippings send for [[his]249-drippings wife]2351-his wife and [family]1573-family . [He]249-drippings knew too much of [Lady Broadhem]166-lady broadhem 's affairs to be at all a desirable domestic either to [herself]166-lady broadhem or to [[her]166-lady broadhem friends in [this country]1901-this country]1800-her friends in this country . " [Lady Broadhem]166-lady broadhem is in [[her]166-lady broadhem own sitting - room]639-her own sitting - room , [[my]249-drippings lord]2022-my lord , "[249-drippings] said [Drippings]249-drippings ; " shall [I]249-drippings show [[your]2022-my lord lordship]1517-your lordship up to [her]166-lady broadhem ? The events of the last twenty - four hours had told upon [her]166-lady broadhem , and the old wrinkles had come back , with several new ones . [She]166-lady broadhem was at that critical age when a great grief or anxiety can make [an elderly person antiquated in a night]1803-an elderly person antiquated in a night — just as hair will turn grey in a few hours . [She]166-lady broadhem put out [her]166-lady broadhem hand without speaking , but with an expression of resignation which seemed to say , " [I]166-lady broadhem acknowledge [myself]166-lady broadhem beaten ; be [a brute]374-a brute or anything else [you]110-grandon like ; trample upon [me]166-lady broadhem , pray — [I]166-lady broadhem am down without the possibility of retaliating , but [you]110-grandon will get very little sport out of [me]166-lady broadhem ; badger [me]166-lady broadhem if [you]110-grandon like , [I]166-lady broadhem do n't mean to show fight . "[166-lady broadhem] All this [I]0-i read in [her]166-lady broadhem face as plainly as if [she]166-lady broadhem had said it ; and [I]0-i thought this a moment when generosity on the part of [the victor]1804-the victor will prove one to be [a true strategist]1805-a true strategist ; and [no one]2360-no one will appreciate it more than [Lady Broadhem]166-lady broadhem . With great gentleness , and without allowing a shade of self - satisfaction to cross [my]0-i face or to penetrate [my]0-i tones , [I]0-i told [her]166-lady broadhem how [I]0-i had propitiated [Bodwinkle]168-bodwinkle , banished [Chundango]140-chundango , provided for [Drippings]249-drippings , and succeeded at last in placing [her]166-lady broadhem affairs generally on a sound footing . " [Your]0-i genius will never be appreciated by [the world]271-the world , [Frank]116-lord frank , "[166-lady broadhem] [she]166-lady broadhem said , smiling half ironically , half sadly . " [I]0-i am quite aware of that , "[0-i] [I]0-i replied ; " nor will this record of [my]0-i experiences in it — except by [you]166-lady broadhem and [one or two others who know how true it is]3050-one or two others who know how true it is . " Yes , "[166-lady broadhem] [she]166-lady broadhem said — and [I]0-i saw the slender nostril dilate with the effort it cost [her]166-lady broadhem to yield the point upon which [she]166-lady broadhem had been so long inflexible—"you want [my]166-lady broadhem consent to [Ursula]124-lady ursula 's marriage with [Grandon]110-grandon . "[166-lady broadhem] " Wait a minute ; [I]0-i should like [Lady Ursula]124-lady ursula to be present , "[0-i] [I]0-i said ; for even now [I]0-i did not feel that [I]0-i could trust [the old lady]2302-the old lady thoroughly , and [I]0-i rang the bell . " [I]166-lady broadhem have sent for [you]0-i , [[my]166-lady broadhem dear]1860-my dear , "[166-lady broadhem] [she]166-lady broadhem said , " to tell [you]0-i how much [we]1810-they owe to [[our]1810-they kind friend]3052-our kind friend here , who has completely relieved [my]166-lady broadhem mind from all those anxieties which have been weighing upon it for the last few years , by [his]3052-our kind friend noble and generous conduct . [Ursula]124-lady ursula , [dear]521-dear , [you]0-i will never know really how much [you]0-i owe [him]3052-our kind friend , for [he]3052-our kind friend has shown [me]166-lady broadhem that [I]166-lady broadhem have not done [my]166-lady broadhem duty to [you]0-i as [a mother]2154-a mother ; "[166-lady broadhem] and [Lady Broadhem]166-lady broadhem 's voice trembled . " Upon [my]166-lady broadhem word , "[166-lady broadhem] [I]0-i thought , " [I]0-i do believe [the old woman]3055-the old woman is sincere ; "[0-i] and [I]0-i looked at [her]166-lady broadhem fixedly . The tears were filling [her]166-lady broadhem eyes . Now pray heaven that [we]1813-we have got to heart at last — it is like sinking a well in [a thirsty desert]1814-a thirsty desert , and coming on water . Yes , there [they]1815-they are welling out , honest large drops , chasing each other to the point of [her]166-lady broadhem nose . Oh , [[my]0-i dear]1860-my dear [Lady Broadhem]166-lady broadhem , [I]0-i am beginning to love [you]166-lady broadhem , and [my]0-i eyes are beginning to swim too ; and before [she]166-lady broadhem knew where [she]166-lady broadhem was , [I]0-i threw [my]0-i arms round [her]166-lady broadhem neck and kissed [her]166-lady broadhem — an example which was rapidly followed both by [Ursula]124-lady ursula and [Broadhem]166-lady broadhem , and which so overcame [[their]1817-their mother]1818-their mother that [she]166-lady broadhem buried [her]166-lady broadhem face in a pillow and sobbed out — in tears that might at first have been bitter , but were assuredly sweet and refreshing at last — [her]166-lady broadhem repentance . [I]0-i do n't think [Broadhem]166-lady broadhem had any very definite idea why [he]1819-he wept , beyond a feeling of sympathy with [[his]1819-he mother]535-his mother , and the fact , which [I]0-i afterwards heard , that [Wild Harrie]219-wild harrie had taken [Spiffy]159-spiffy 's advice , and refused [him]1819-he ; so [he]1819-he mingled [his]1819-he tears with [hers]166-lady broadhem , but [Lady Ursula]124-lady ursula 's eyes were dry and supernaturally brilliant . As [I]0-i gazed on [the group]555-the group , [my]0-i own heart seemed to swell to bursting . [I]0-i do really believe and trust that [Lady Broadhem]166-lady broadhem will give up the worldly - holies , and become [a pious good woman]1822-a pious good woman ; and that those talents and that force of character which [she]166-lady broadhem possesses may be dedicated to a higher service than [they]1823-they have heretofore been . If [I]0-i have been [the humble instrument of working the change]1824-the humble instrument of working the change , the sooner [I]0-i send [Grandon]110-grandon here and vanish [myself]0-i from the scene , the better , or [I]0-i shall become vain and conceited , [I]0-i thought ; and [I]0-i rose from [my]0-i seat . " Good - bye , [Lady Broadhem]166-lady broadhem , "[0-i] [I]0-i said , " [you]166-lady broadhem will not see [me]0-i again . [I]0-i am going to [America]17-america in three days , and must go to [Flityville]29-flityville to - morrow ; but [I]0-i never thought [I]0-i could have bid [you]166-lady broadhem all farewell and felt so happy at the prospect of parting ; "[0-i] and [I]0-i threw one yearning glance on [Ursula]124-lady ursula in spite of [myself]0-i . " [Your]124-lady ursula happiness is secured , [I]0-i do most firmly believe , "[0-i] [I]0-i said to [her]124-lady ursula ; " and as for [you]124-lady ursula , "[0-i] and [I]0-i laid [my]0-i hand on [Broadhem]166-lady broadhem 's shoulder , " remember the experiment [I]0-i proposed to [you]124-lady ursula the other night , and try it ; "[0-i] and [I]0-i was moving off when [Ursula]124-lady ursula seized [my]0-i hand , and almost dragged [me]0-i back to [[her]124-lady ursula mother]365-her mother 's side . [She]124-lady ursula lifted up [her]124-lady ursula eyes like one inspired , and the radiancy of [her]124-lady ursula expression seemed to dazzle and blind [me]0-i . Then [she]124-lady ursula knelt down , and [I]0-i knelt by [her]124-lady ursula side , while [[her]124-lady ursula mother]365-her mother lay before [us]1827-us , [her]365-her mother whole frame heaving with convulsive sobs , and [Broadhem]166-lady broadhem stood by wondering and awestruck . [I]0-i ca n't repeat that prayer here , but there was a power in those gentle accents which stilled the stormy elements , as the waves of [the sea]1828-the sea were once stilled before ; and when the thrilling voice ceased there was a great calm , and [we]1827-us knew that a change had been affected in [that place]1829-that place . Then the floodgates were opened which had been to that moment barred , and [Lady Ursula]124-lady ursula threw [herself]124-lady ursula on [[her]124-lady ursula mother]365-her mother 's bosom , and wept tears of gratitude , and [I]0-i stole silently away to [the drawing - room]331-the drawing - room , and led [Grandon]110-grandon by the hand , without uttering a word , to [that room into which a new atmosphere had descended]1832-that room into which a new atmosphere had descended , and a new breath had called into existence a new nature . [He]110-grandon started back on the threshold at the picture before [him]110-grandon . [Lady Broadhem]166-lady broadhem , apparently scarcely conscious , clasped in the arms of [[her]166-lady broadhem weeping daughter]1833-her weeping daughter ; and [Broadhem]166-lady broadhem — [poor Broadhem]166-lady broadhem — bewildered at the sight of [the strong woman [he]110-grandon had dreaded and worshipped thus suddenly breaking down]1834-the strong woman he had dreaded and worshipped thus suddenly breaking down , was sitting on a footstool at [[his]110-grandon mother]535-his mother 's side , holding one of [her]166-lady broadhem hands , helplessly . " Good [God]130-god ! [Frank]116-lord frank , "[110-grandon] said [Grandon]110-grandon , in a whisper , for neither [Lady Broadhem]166-lady broadhem nor [[her]166-lady broadhem daughter]566-her daughter saw [us]1837-us , " what have [you]116-lord frank been doing ? "[166-lady broadhem] " Beginning the work which is left for [you]116-lord frank to finish ; "[0-i] and [I]0-i gently disengaged one of [Lady Ursula]124-lady ursula 's hands , and drew it towards [me]0-i . " On [you]566-her daughter , "[0-i] [I]0-i said to [her]566-her daughter solemnly , " has been bestowed a great gift ; use it as [you]566-her daughter have done , and may [he]110-grandon share it with [you]566-her daughter , and support [you]566-her daughter in the lifelong trial it must involve , and in the ridicule to which [you]566-her daughter will both be exposed . For [myself]0-i , [I]0-i go to seek it where [I]0-i am told [I]0-i shall alone find it . "[0-i] [I]0-i placed [her]566-her daughter hand in [Grandon]110-grandon 's , kissed [[her]566-her daughter mother]365-her mother on the forehead , and hurried from [the room]2119-the room . Then the strain on [my]0-i nervous system suddenly relaxed . [I]0-i am conscious of [Drippings]249-drippings helping [me]0-i into [a cab]1840-a cab , and going with [me]0-i to [Piccadilly]7-piccadilly , and of one coming in and finding [me]0-i stretched on [my]0-i bed , and of [his]249-drippings lifting [me]0-i from it by a single touch , just as [Drippings]249-drippings was going off in quest of [the doctor]1841-the doctor . It was [he]249-drippings who had met [me]0-i that night when [I]0-i was walking with [Broadhem]166-lady broadhem , but [his]249-drippings name [I]0-i am unable to divulge . " Stay here , [[my]249-drippings friend]265-my friend , "[249-drippings] [he]249-drippings said to [Drippings]249-drippings , " and pack [[your]265-my friend master]3057-your master 's things : there is no need for [the doctor]1841-the doctor ; [I]249-drippings will take [him]3057-your master to [America]17-america . "[249-drippings] And [my]0-i heart leaped within [me]0-i , for its predictions were verified , and the path lay clear before [me]0-i . And now , on this last night in [England]10-england , as [I]0-i pen the last lines of this record of [my]0-i life during the six months that are past , and look back to the spirit in which it was begun , and examine the influences which impelled [me]0-i to write as [I]0-i have , [I]0-i see that [I]0-i too have undergone a change , and that the time has come when , if [I]0-i wished , [I]0-i can no more descant as heretofore on the faults and foibles of the day . Among those who have read [me]0-i there may be [some who have so well understood]1842-some who have so well understood , that [they]1842-some who have so well understood will see why this is so . If in what [I]0-i have said [I]0-i have hurt the feelings of [any man]2234-any man or [woman]1844-woman in [my]0-i desire to expose the vices of [society at large]1845-society at large , [they]1846-they will be of those who have failed to detect why [I]0-i have said thus much , and needs must stop [here]2005-here ; but none the less earnestly would [I]0-i assure [them]1842-some who have so well understood that it has been against [my]0-i will and intention to wound [any one]2366-any one . As [I]0-i began because [I]0-i could not help it , so [I]0-i end because [I]0-i am obliged . [My]0-i task is done . The seed which [I]0-i found in [my]0-i hand , such as it was , [I]0-i have sown . Whether it rots and dies in the ground , or springs up and brings forth fruit , is a matter in which [I]0-i can not , and ought not , to have the smallest personal interest .
